r2dii.analysis 0.0.0.9004

    • Sectoral Decarbonization Approach (SDA)
    • Market Share Approach
  • r2dii

Here I show how to use the development mode of the pkgdown website.

I’m now working on an experimental branch and want to show what I’m doing on the development version of the package-website.

  • I put this in _pkgdown.yml:
development:
  mode: devel
  • Then I run knit README.Rmd and run pkgdown::deploy_to_branch(branch = "gh-pages", remote = "upstream").

If the release website is published at */<package>/* (e.g. https://2degreesinvesting.github.io/r2dii.analysis/dev/index.html), then the devel version is published at */<package>/dev/* (e.g. https://2degreesinvesting.github.io/r2dii.analysis/dev/index.html).
